title: Ilhan Omar questions UFC executive over fighter pay and Muhammad Ali Boxing Revival Act
description: The Muhammad Ali American Boxing Revival Act seeks to bring UFC style promotion to the sport of boxing
content:
The Muhammad Ali American Boxing Revival Act seeks to bring UFC-style promotion to the sport of boxing, and now the proposed law is winding its way through the halls of Congress.
On Thursday, a hear… [+6714 chars]
